article: There were two villages in South Asia. They were always fighting each other for more farms. One village lived in the low land and the other lived  _  in the mountains. The mountain people came to the low land one day. They stole a  _  from one of the low land families and took him back up into the mountains. The people in the low land didn't know  _  to climb the mountain. They didn't know where to find the mountain people. Even so, they sent their  _  fighters to climb the mountain to bring the baby back. The fighters  _  many ways of climbing. They used ropes, and they also used ladders. At last, they stepped  _  others' shoulders to climb. But  _  worked. After several days of hard work, they climbed only 100 meters. Feeling  _  , the fighters decided to return to their village. As they were ready to go back, they saw the baby's mother  _  to them. They were greatly surprised to see her baby was on her back. How could it be? They asked the mother how she  _  the baby. She said, " Because it isn't your baby. " As long as you have love in your heart, there is no mountain you can't climb.
